text: Zweisimmen is a municipality in the administrative district of Obersimmental- Saanen in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:Zweisimmen- Stacidomo 021.jpg|Zweisimmen train station File:Zweisimmen 027.jpg|Zweisimmen ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Municipalities in Obersimmental-Saanen
title: Zweisimmen
